info.title: Supplier Quotation for Sourcing Project
info.description: This service enables you to create, read, update, and delete supplier quotations for sourcing projects and their sub-entities. This includes, for example, items, incoterms, or notes. A quotation can either be created with reference from a sourcing project or with reference from a negotiation. Furthermore, you can submit, revise, or withdraw a quotation. With regard to pricing, you can simulate pricing, update item conditions, delete item conditions, or read the investment item amount in a converted currency. It is also possible to include or exclude items and only submit offers for specific items. If there are any issues during the execution of the actions, the system displays error messages in the response.

x-sap-shortText: Manage supplier quotations using this inbound synchronous service

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Procurement: Sourcing Project Quotation Header (MM_PUR_SRCGPROJQTN_HEADER)
* Procurement: Sourcing Project Quotation Demand Distribution Details (MM_PUR_SRCGPROJQTN_DMN_DST_DET)
* Procurement: Sourcing Project Quotation Supplier Contact (MM_PUR_SRCGPROJQTN_SUPL_CONT)
* Procurement: Product Footprint Plant in Quotation Item (MM_PUR_SRCGPROJQTN_ITEM_PRFPP)
* Procurement: Sourcing Project Quotation Item (MM_PUR_SRCGPROJQTN_ITEM)
* Procurement: Product Footprint for Quotation Item (MM_PUR_SRCGPROJQTN_ITEM_PRDFP)
* Procurement: Sourcing Project Quotation Demand Distribution (MM_PUR_SRCGPROJQTN_DMND_DIST)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)
